title: Sprint 04: Routing, Controllers & Validation
description: Mastering the request handling layer, enforcing rules, and managing flow.
items: 01- Router Verbs: GET/POST/PUT/PATCH/DELETE nuances, spoofing form methods
02- Route Parameters: Wildcards, Regex constraints, Optional params, Dependency injection
03- Route Model Binding: Implicit logic, scoping, customizing resolution keys, Missing handlers
04- Route Grouping: Prefixes, Middleware groups, Subdomain routing, Controller grouping
05- Named Routes & URL Gen: route() helper, Signed URLs, Temporary URLs for security
06- Middleware: Creating middleware, terminable middleware, passing parameters
07- Rate Limiting: RateLimiter facade, per-route limits, Redis backing, Dynamic limits
08- Controller Theory: Skinny controllers, Resource controllers, Invokable controllers
09- Validation Rules: FormRequest classes, authorize(), available rules breakdown
10- Custom Validation: Rule objects, Closures, After validation hooks, Error messages
11- Sanitization: Input trimming, strip_tags, casting input data, array filters
12- Session Handling: Drivers (File/Redis), Flash data, putting/pulling session state
13- Cookie mechanics: Encryption, queueing cookies, response attachment, serialization
14- CSRF Protection: VerifyCsrfToken, X-CSRF-TOKEN headers, excluding routes
15- Localization: Language files, __() helper, URL-based locale switching basics
